title: Dungeon Manager
body: A Dungeons and Dragons managment tool for players and DM's alike. As a DM create a campaign and track all your players charactes in one place. As a player create your character and join a campaign to view your party.

title: Cornucopia
body: A MEAN app that allows users to share their favorie recipes with the world.

title: Running Man
body: A fitness app that allows you to chart your running route on google maps and recieve distance and elevation data from the run. Chart multiple routes and compare.
